name: Maniac GO
detailed_description:
One against all .... No, this is not the dreams of a suffering teenager, it's an ordinary day in the life of our hero. To kill? Gone?
Have a good time, carving the eyes of a sobbing victim? Each of his actions drags on the death penalty, together they make up
An amazing cocktail of insanity, excitement and unreasonably good mood. Today, mankind will again face
With his reflection in a huge crooked mirror.
***
An amazing mixture of game genres in the popular neon atmosphere of insanity. We assume the role of a maniac who writes his universal comedy with blood. The game is different in a variety of gameplay - somewhere in hiring is secretive, somewhere you will need to take weapons and arrange a bloody farce, and sometimes you can even drive like a combat armor. And most often the game will not force you to some style of passage, control stealthily or openly - it's up to you. For the game written soundtrack, emphasizing the atmosphere of bloody madness, a sadist of irony or a severe depression of our hero. The game is something like the most
Popular representatives of the neon style, such as Hotline Miami or Party Hard, but contributing its originality, a part of originality in the popular direction of games.
***
Why am I doing this? You yourself wanted it .. I just embody your secret desires, as well as hatred for me? I just did it.
